liquidatePositionIsolated(uint256,uint25.details: Unlike a cross liquidation, we don't check for major deficits here.      Counterparties should put limit sell orders at the liquidation price      of the user, in order to mitigate the deficit. Failure to do so      would result in the counterParty paying for the deficit.The above describes 'major' deficits. There's always a deficit,      however the CVA aims to cover that.Cross positions are ALLOWED in order to liquidate partyB.
